author: stefanbratanov
content: Hey Chris, i am interested in creating a specification if anyone hasn't jumped in and done it yet. I work closely with <@504202741933932544> and we had few discussions about it. I suppose I can post a PR to the mev-boost docs ( https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost ) and then have further discussion on the PR itself. Wdyt?

author: metachris_
content: Sounds great. The builder-specs repository would also be a good fit, both work from my perspective.

author: stefanbratanov
content: Great, i will work on a markdown document and think where to raise the PR afterwards

author: metachris_
content: The first mev-boost security audit has completed, with a few minor findings on mev-boost, and one medium issue that should be clarified in the relay documentation: https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/issues/161#issuecomment-1184476809

author: tbenr
content:

author: metachris_
content: Yes that's not unexpected! Not every slot has a block from our builder.

author: tersec
content: the logic I've been using is, if 200, continue, else bail, and maybe report/log error -- is that correct?
